data.title: North Texas Breast & Plastic Surgery Center: Plastic Surgeon Denton, TX
data.meta_description: Want to enhance or rejuvenate your body, breasts, or face? Board-certified plastic surgeon Bruce Hermann can help you achieve life-changing results.
data.text:
Summer is just around the corner. Are you ready to show off your best features?

It’s time to picture your ideal size, shape, and style!

What type of cosmetic surgery is right for you?

TAKE ADVANTAGE OF OUR SPECIALS

$500 Off Cosmetic Breast Surgery

$500 Off BodyTite™, FaceTite™ & Morpheus8™ Treatments

North Texas Breast & Plastic Surgery Center is a comprehensive plastic surgery practice in Denton, TX, where patients can expect beautiful results and compassionate care. We focus on breast and body surgery, and we use the latest techniques to consistently provide gorgeous yet natural-looking enhancements. No matter what your concerns are, plastic surgeon Bruce Hermann and his team will listen to your goals, educate you about your options, and ensure that your results meet your expectations. We welcome new and existing patients from throughout the area, including Lewisville, TX, and Flower Mound, TX.

As a native of Denton County, Dr. Hermann is proud to serve the great state of Texas. Before opening his own practice, Dr. Hermann:

Attended Baylor University

Attended medical school at Texas Tech School of Medicine

Completed a prestigious general surgery program at the University of Louisville

Completed a plastic surgery fellowship at the University of Tennessee-Chattanooga

Trained under world-renowned plastic surgeon Dennis C. Hammond

Our practice is located in Denton, TX, making it convenient for visitors from Lewisville and Flower Mound. To request a consultation with our plastic surgeon, contact us online or call us:

(940) 387-4900

I can't say enough about the incredible experience I had with Dr. Hermann and his staff. I feel more confident in my own skin and I have you to thank for that! This is something I've wanted to do for over 20 years and finally had the courage to do it. Each and every one of you put my mind at ease with your caring demeanor and expert knowledge!

View on Google

Dr. Hermann is a rare find. He is a skilled surgeon, but beyond that he is talented, artistic. Additionally, he listened, answered questioned at my level of understanding and followed through with a calm and ease that won me over. Such a positive experience.

View on Google

Plastic surgeon Bruce Hermann in Denton, TX, has trained under world-renowned plastic surgeons to learn the most advanced techniques in cosmetic and reconstructive surgery. Dr. Hermann specializes in breast surgeries. During his training under leading breast surgeon Dennis C. Hammond, Dr. Hermann mastered the BodyLogic™ system, which allows him to take precise measurements for breast implants and test different implant sizes before permanent placement. He has also received special training in hand surgery.

Dr. Hermann performs every step of these surgical enhancements himself, from the initial incision to the final suture. Patient education and safety are of the utmost importance to Dr. Hermann. He provides detailed instructions for pre- and post-surgical care and will monitor your recovery closely to ensure the best possible outcome. He also works slowly and deliberately to deliver excellent results every time.

All of the procedures offered at our Denton, TX, plastic surgery center can be completed on an outpatient basis, meaning they do not require an overnight stay at the hospital. Although recovery time varies from one procedure to the next, patients can typically return home on the day of their procedure. After surgery, Dr. Hermann is reachable on his personal phone at any time of day.

When it comes to your face, breasts, or body, you want an excellent surgeon to provide the enhancements you desire. Dr. Hermann is one of the most skilled plastic surgeons in Texas, and he has received outstanding reviews from those he has helped.

Our practice is located in Denton, TX, so it's just a short drive from neighboring communities like Lewisville and Flower Mound. To discuss your cosmetic concerns with Dr. Hermann, send us a message or call us:

(940) 387-4900
